price: Nyuma ye twanabwiye bene Isiraheli tuti “Nimuture mu gihugu (cya Misiri ndetse na Shami), ubwo isezerano ry’umunsi w’imperuka rizaza, tuzabazana muri igihiriri (muri amahanga atandukanye).”
arabic: وَقُلۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ لِبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱسۡكُنُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا جَآءَ وَعۡدُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ جِئۡنَا بِكُمۡ لَفِيفٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqul'nā min baʿdihi libanī is'rāīla us'kunū al-arḍa fa-idhā jāa waʿdu al-ākhirati ji'nā bikum lafīfan
